verses.roman:
rūpa-gosāñi prabhu-pāśe karilā gamana
prabhure dekhite tāṅra utkaṇṭhita mana

synonyms: rūpa-gosāñi—of the name Rūpa Gosvāmī; prabhu-pāśe—the place of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karilā gamana—departed for; prabhure dekhite—to see Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅra—his; utkaṇṭhita—full of anxiety; mana—mind.
translation: Rūpa Gosvāmī then departed to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, for he was very eager to see Him.
